name: Pharon Jones
title: Budtender
coverLetter: My name is Pharon, im 23 I'm fun, personable and hardworking. I love cannabis, anything you love you will go hard for. I love educating people about the benefits the plant can have and not only "getting high". It truly is a Medicine that many can benefit from. Before moving here I knew nothing, now in the short time I was willing and determined because it's a field I'm passionate about.
experience:
Work Experiences
01/18/2017 to 06/02/2017
Budtender, House of Champions Inglewood,CA
Opened store set out all the jars and other products. Filled the jars when low, weight out the flower for inventory. Weight out the product for customers. Knowledge about flower and edibles and weigh outs. Updates weedmaps , and social media. 

01/06/2017 to 05/02/2017
Cage Cashier, Commerce CasinoCommerce,CA
Cashed out winning chips,  filed CRA's , tax documents, count draws at beginning and end of shift to balance. Handled 100,000 in cash daily.

06/20/16 to 12/2/16
Server, Pitfire Pizza, Pasadena, CA 
Hybrid service so we worked together as a team. Such as bussing, Cashier, food runner.

09/16/15 to 6/14/2014
Server, Denny's, Gardena, CA
Greeting quest, writing food orders down and logging them into the POS. Making salads and milk shakes and smoothies while running food.
